column4: hello all: does ubuntu work with USB modem? i have a speedtouch 330 USB modem
hello all: does ubuntu work with USB modem? i have a speedtouch 330 USB modem
that modem is supported under linux, but it's not massively easy to get working, you may find yourself fiddling.
somebody from a belgium linux group told me that ubuntu can install it easly with a Wizard ...
he told me i have to look into the internet options
last time I configured one of those there was fiddling required.
fiddling is what the page I linked you to tells you how to do.
okay thank you very much, last question when i will try to install this driver my modem will not get broken right ?
i don't have to install software on the hardware of my modem right?
it's unlikely, but I couldn't tell you for sure. Free Software doesn't come with guarantees. :)
okay i will see what i can do thanks for the help
